reviewText:
If you can pretend that the actors are not high school kids and focus on the subject matter and presentation, you will find this a great video.

This video handles the topic of leadership and team building using contemporary terminology.  It provides strategies.  The video compliments most current text books (in terms of approach).

The high school actors do take away from the credibility of the instruction unfortunately.

I bought this DVD and sent it back to the author.
I did not even ask my money back - it's drivel of the lowest order.
I was very disappointed with this product.  The presentation is targeted to K-12 students.  This video is overpriced, the material covered is superficial, and the presentation is not entertaining.
